Package fr.rphstudio.chess.game

Class RemovedPiece

java.lang.Object
fr.rphstudio.chess.game.RemovedPiece
public class RemovedPiece
extends java.lang.Object
this class is used to have the information about removed pieces from each player

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    RemovedPiece()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addBlack​(IChess.ChessType type)
    This method is used to add a black piece's Type to the corresponding list
    void addWhite​(IChess.ChessType type)
    This method is used to add a white piece's Type to the corresponding list
    static RemovedPiece getInstance()
    This method is used as a design pattern singleton
    java.util.List<IChess.ChessType> getRemovedPieces​(IChess.ChessColor color)
    This method is used to get the removed piece List , used to displayed the pieces in game
    int getRemovedPiecesNumber​(IChess.ChessColor color)
    This method is used to get number of removed piece depending of the color given in parameter.
    void reinitialiseList()
    This method is used to reinitialise the removed piece list for each player
    void removedBlack()
    This method is used to removed the last black piece's Type of the corresponding list
    void removedWhite()
    This method is used to removed the last black piece's Type of the corresponding list

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static RemovedPiece getInstance()
      This method is used as a design pattern singleton
      Returns:
      RemovedPiece : an unique instance of RemovedPiece

    • reinitialiseList

      public void reinitialiseList()
      This method is used to reinitialise the removed piece list for each player

    • getRemovedPieces

      public java.util.List<IChess.ChessType> getRemovedPieces​(IChess.ChessColor color)
      This method is used to get the removed piece List , used to displayed the pieces in game
      Parameters:
      color - ChessColor : the color of the player from which we want the removed pieces
      Returns:
      List : list of ChessType containing all the pieces type already removed

    • getRemovedPiecesNumber

      public int getRemovedPiecesNumber​(IChess.ChessColor color)
      This method is used to get number of removed piece depending of the color given in parameter. It used to avoid to go through all the table to count all the piece on board for a specific color, so two loop less.
      Parameters:
      color - ChessColor : the player's color
      Returns:
      int : the number

    • addBlack

      public void addBlack​(IChess.ChessType type)
      This method is used to add a black piece's Type to the corresponding list
      Parameters:
      type - ChessTyp : piece's type

    • addWhite

      public void addWhite​(IChess.ChessType type)
      This method is used to add a white piece's Type to the corresponding list
      Parameters:
      type - ChessTyp : piece's type

    • removedBlack

      public void removedBlack()
      This method is used to removed the last black piece's Type of the corresponding list

    • removedWhite

      public void removedWhite()
      This method is used to removed the last black piece's Type of the corresponding list
